name: Ninja?
description:
Granting you with absolute control "Ninja?" puts you in the shoes of a parkouring robot as you hurdle through space to avoid objects and jump through gates to set new high scores. Using a variety of abilities such as dash, double jump, and sprint, it is up to you to make it as far as you can through a procedurally generated level in this endless runner style game. Go for the high score or take it slow and go for distance, the choice is yours.

Play though a training course to perfect your skills or go for the distance in an endless procedurally generated level.
